title: Implement Layout Integration
description: Integrate header, sidebar, and main content areas to create complete Layout 2 and Layout 3 implementations

user_stories: As a user, I want consistent layout across all pages so that I can navigate easily
As a developer, I need reusable layout components so that I can build pages quickly
business_rules: Layout components must follow Layout 2 and Layout 3 specifications
Layout components must be responsive and mobile-friendly
Layout components must integrate with authentication system
Layout components must support different user roles
edge_cases: Handling layout on mobile devices with limited screen space
Managing layout state during authentication changes
Supporting different user roles with appropriate navigation
Ensuring accessibility compliance for layout components

acceptance_criteria: Header component displays consistently across all authenticated pages
Sidebar navigation adapts based on user role and authentication status
Layout components are responsive and mobile-friendly
Layout components integrate properly with routing system
Layout components follow the design system specifications

unit_tests: Layout component rendering with different user roles

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement layout integration following React best practices. Create layout provider for consistent state management. Ensure proper responsive design and mobile menu functionality.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure layout components don't expose sensitive information about user roles or system structure
